neg review: Terrible radiator! It's too freezing and my friend got a cold. Nobody solved this problem even previous clients have complained. The staff suggested us to have a big hug to get warm. It's really nice, thank you!
Th room was too small and sink basin was very small.

pos review: it is near metro and in centre of cultural and historical places.room was nice and have big bed.
Friendly and helpful staff, comfortable bed and good showers.  Excellent location.
neg review: The room was very cold.  The hotel is nice but needs some TLC.

Room needs major uplift
Not value for money at 145 euro a night

pos review: Convenient and inexpensive. Staff friendly. Simple french breakfast - convenient.
neg review: Ventilation. Room was a bit smelly. Lift was small.
Need some hooks on walls to hang towels, coats, etc.
